quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
name: Confucius

quote: To love beauty is to see light.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: Beauty is only skin deep. If you go after someone just because she's beautiful but don't have anything to talk about, it's going to get boring fast. You want to look beyond the surface and see if you can have fun or if you have anything in common with this person.

quote: A woman whose smile is open and whose expression is glad has a kind of beauty no matter what she wears.

quote: People are like stained - glass windows. They sparkle and shine when the sun is out, but when the darkness sets in, their true beauty is revealed only if there is a light from within.

quote: The pursuit of truth and beauty is a sphere of activity in which we are permitted to remain children all our lives.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Of life's two chief prizes, beauty and truth, I found the first in a loving heart and the second in a laborer's hand.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: Love of beauty is taste. The creation of beauty is art.

quote: A thing of beauty is a joy forever: its loveliness increases it will never pass into nothingness.
name: John Keats

quote: Beauty is eternity gazing at itself in a mirror.

quote: A beauty is a woman you notice a charmer is one who notices you.

quote: She got her looks from her father. He's a plastic surgeon.

quote: Beauty and folly are old companions.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Rare is the union of beauty and purity.
name: Juvenal

quote: Personal beauty is a greater recommendation than any letter of reference.
name: Aristotle

quote: Beauty is unbearable, drives us to despair, offering us for a minute the glimpse of an eternity that we should like to stretch out over the whole of time.
name: Albert Camus

quote: The world's biggest power is the youth and beauty of a woman.
name: Chanakya

quote: Beauty awakens the soul to act.
name: Dante Alighieri

quote: A witty woman is a treasure a witty beauty is a power.

quote: Think of all the beauty still left around you and be happy.

quote: Beauty is a manifestation of secret natural laws, which otherwise would have been hidden from us forever.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Beauty is all very well at first sight but who ever looks at it when it has been in the house three days?
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Beauty has a lot to do with character.
name: Kevyn Aucoin

quote: I define nothing. Not beauty, not patriotism. I take each thing as it is, without prior rules about what it should be.

quote: Beauty is worse than wine, it intoxicates both the holder and beholder.

quote: Beauty in things exists in the mind which contemplates them.

quote: I don't think of all the misery but of the beauty that still remains.
name: Anne Frank

quote: Beauty is not caused. It is.
name: Emily Dickinson

quote: Beauty is truth's smile when she beholds her own face in a perfect mirror.

quote: Beauty is everywhere a welcome guest.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: It is amazing how complete is the delusion that beauty is goodness.

quote: A mode of conduct, a standard of courage, discipline, fortitude and integrity can do a great deal to make a woman beautiful.
name: Jacqueline Bisset

quote: Beauty, n: the power by which a woman charms a lover and terrifies a husband.
name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Dear God! how beauty varies in nature and art. In a woman the flesh must be like marble in a statue the marble must be like flesh.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: Beauty doesn't need ornaments. Softness can't bear the weight of ornaments.
name: Munshi Premchand

quote: Beauty is in the heart of the beholder.
name: H. G. Wells

quote: Let us live for the beauty of our own reality.

quote: Every year of my life I grow more convinced that it is wisest and best to fix our attention on the beautiful and the good, and dwell as little as possible on the evil and the false.

quote: Beauty is the promise of happiness.
name: Edmund Burke

quote: Imagination disposes of everything it creates beauty, justice, and happiness, which are everything in this world.

quote: A women's greatest asset is her beauty.

quote: Beauty is indeed a good gift of God but that the good may not think it a great good, God dispenses it even to the wicked.
name: Saint Augustine

quote: Beauty is only temporary, but your mind lasts you a lifetime.

quote: Beauty is a fragile gift.
name: Ovid

name: Matthew Fox

quote: In every man's heart there is a secret nerve that answers to the vibrations of beauty.
name: Christopher Morley

quote: Love built on beauty, soon as beauty, dies.
name: John Donne

quote: I don't need plastic in my body to validate me as a woman.
name: Courtney Love

quote: Beauty is less important than quality.
name: Eugene Ormandy

quote: There is a kind of beauty in imperfection.

quote: Beauty is the first present nature gives to women and the first it takes away.

quote: There is no cosmetic for beauty like happiness.

quote: Even in the centuries which appear to us to be the most monstrous and foolish, the immortal appetite for beauty has always found satisfaction.

quote: Inner beauty should be the most important part of improving one's self.
name: Priscilla Presley

quote: What beauty is, I know not, though it adheres to many things.

quote: Though beauty gives you a weird sense of entitlement, it's rather frightening and threatening to have others ascribe such importance to something you know you're just renting for a while.

quote: Things are beautiful if you love them.

name: Katherine Anne Porter

name: David Byrne

quote: Integrity reveals beauty.
name: Thomas Leonard

quote: If you get simple beauty and naught else, you get about the best thing God invents.
name: Robert Browning

quote: Goodness is beauty in the best estate.
name: Christopher Marlowe

quote: Our hearts were drunk with a beauty Our eyes could never see.
name: George William Russell

quote: Like charity, I believe glamour should begin at home.
name: Loretta Young

quote: How goodness heightens beauty!
name: Milan Kundera

quote: Because beauty isn't enough, there must be something more.
name: Eva Herzigova

quote: Taking joy in living is a woman's best cosmetic.

quote: Beauty is one of the rare things which does not lead to doubt of God.

quote: I'd like to grow up and be beautiful. I know it doesn't matter, but it doesn't hurt.

quote: Beauty is only skin deep.
name: Thomas Overbury

quote: You can't really say what is beautiful about a place, but the image of the place will remain vividly with you.

quote: The plainer the dress, the greater luster does beauty appear.

quote: It's sad when girls think they don't have anything going on except being pretty.

quote: There is hope and a kind of beauty in there somewhere, if you look for it.

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

name: Audrey Hepburn

quote: It is time for parents to teach young people early on that in diversity there is beauty and there is strength.

quote: When I admire the wonders of a sunset or the beauty of the moon, my soul expands in the worship of the creator.

quote: Education is the best friend. An educated person is respected everywhere. Education beats the beauty and the youth.

quote: The beauty of a woman is not in the clothes she wears, the figure that she carries or the way she combs her hair.

quote: Wisdom I know is social. She seeks her fellows. But Beauty is jealous, and illy bears the presence of a rival.

quote: Love is the beauty of the soul.
name: Saint Augustine

quote: Beauty without expression is boring.

name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Beauty is an outward gift, which is seldom despised, except by those to whom it has been refused.

quote: As we grow old, the beauty steals inward.

quote: A healthful hunger for a great idea is the beauty and blessedness of life.

quote: Beauty and femininity are ageless and can't be contrived, and glamour, although the manufacturers won't like this, cannot be manufactured. Not real glamour it's based on femininity.

quote: The perception of beauty is a moral test.

quote: Poetry is the rhythmical creation of beauty in words.

quote: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.

quote: Beauty is a short-lived tyranny.
name: George Bernard Shaw

name: John Keats

name: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: The beauty, the poetry of the fear in their eyes. I didn't mind going to jail for, what, five, six hours? It was absolutely worth it.
name: Johnny Depp

name: Jacqueline Bisset

name: Louisa May Alcott

name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Beauty is the greatest seducer of man.

quote: Be sure what you want and be sure about yourself. Fashion is not just beauty, it's about good attitude. You have to believe in yourself and be strong.
name: Adriana Lima

name: Stephen King

quote: If truth is beauty, how come no one has their hair done in the library?
name: Lily Tomlin

quote: It's not beauty but fine qualities, my girl, that keep a husband.

quote: What would be ugly in a garden constitutes beauty in a mountain.

name: Victor Hugo

quote: The books that help you most are those which make you think that most. The hardest way of learning is that of easy reading but a great book that comes from a great thinker is a ship of thought, deep freighted with truth and beauty.
name: Pablo Neruda

name: Victor Hugo

quote: Whatever you may look like, marry a man your own age - as your beauty fades, so will his eyesight.
name: Phyllis Diller

name: Timothy Radcliffe

name: Conan O'Brien

quote: Endurance is nobler than strength, and patience than beauty.
name: John Ruskin

quote: Secrecy is the element of all goodness even virtue, even beauty is mysterious.
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: Art can never exist without naked beauty displayed.
name: William Blake

quote: Exuberance is beauty.
name: William Blake

quote: It's a good thing that beauty is only skin deep, or I'd be rotten to the core.
name: Phyllis Diller

quote: Sexiness wears thin after a while and beauty fades, but to be married to a man who makes you laugh every day, ah, now that's a real treat.
name: Joanne Woodward

quote: Photography records the gamut of feelings written on the human face, the beauty of the earth and skies that man has inherited, and the wealth and confusion man has created. It is a major force in explaining man to man.
name: Edward Steichen

quote: Most sets of values would give rise to universes that, although they might be very beautiful, would contain no one able to wonder at that beauty.
name: Stephen Hawking

quote: Love is the attempt to form a friendship inspired by beauty.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: There are no better cosmetics than a severe temperance and purity, modesty and humility, a gracious temper and calmness of spirit and there is no true beauty without the signatures of these graces in the very countenance.
name: Arthur Helps

quote: Beauty is an ecstasy it is as simple as hunger. There is really nothing to be said about it. It is like the perfume of a rose: you can smell it and that is all.
name: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: I can barely conceive of a type of beauty in which there is no Melancholy.
name: Charles Baudelaire

quote: That which you create in beauty and goodness and truth lives on for all time to come. Don't spend your life accumulating material objects that will only turn to dust and ashes.
name: Denis Waitley

quote: A person however learned and qualified in his life's work in whom gratitude is absent, is devoid of that beauty of character which makes personality fragrant.
name: Hazrat Inayat Khan

quote: Facts which at first seem improbable will, even on scant explanation, drop the cloak which has hidden them and stand forth in naked and simple beauty.
name: Galileo Galilei

quote: Beauty in distress is much the most affecting beauty.

quote: The beauty of independence, departure, actions that rely on themselves.
name: Walt Whitman

quote: Beauty makes idiots sad and wise men merry.
name: George Jean Nathan

quote: Look up, laugh loud, talk big, keep the color in your cheek and the fire in your eye, adorn your person, maintain your health, your beauty and your animal spirits.
name: William Hazlitt

quote: Should you shield the canyons from the windstorms you would never see the true beauty of their carvings.
name: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quote: The best part of beauty is that which no picture can express.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: When I say that human beings are just gene machines, one shouldn't put too much emphasis on the word 'just.' There is a very great deal of complication, and indeed beauty in being a gene machine.
name: Richard Dawkins

quote: It is the addition of strangeness to beauty that constitutes the romantic character in art.
name: Walter Hagen

quote: Beauty may be skin deep, but ugly goes clear to the bone.
name: Redd Foxx

quote: Beauty is in the eye of the beer holder.
name: Kinky Friedman

quote: Teach us that wealth is not elegance, that profusion is not magnificence, that splendor is not beauty.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: I also became close to nature, and am now able to appreciate the beauty with which this world is endowed.
name: James Dean

quote: In marriage do thou be wise: prefer the person before money, virtue before beauty, the mind before the body then thou hast a wife, a friend, a companion, a second self.
name: William Penn

quote: That's one of the nice things. I mean, part of the beauty of me is that I'm very rich. So if I need $600 million, I can put $600 million myself. That's a huge advantage. I must tell you, that's a huge advantage over the other candidates.
name: Donald Trump

quote: At fifteen, beauty and talent do not exist there can only be promise of the coming woman.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: Children, dear and loving children, can alone console a woman for the loss of her beauty.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: If in my youth I had realized that the sustaining splendour of beauty of with which I was in love would one day flood back into my heart, there to ignite a flame that would torture me without end, how gladly would I have put out the light in my eyes.
name: Michelangelo

quote: A day spent without the sight or sound of beauty, the contemplation of mystery, or the search of truth or perfection is a poverty-stricken day and a succession of such days is fatal to human life.
name: Lewis Mumford

quote: At some point in life the world's beauty becomes enough. You don't need to photograph, paint or even remember it. It is enough.
name: Toni Morrison

quote: Light, God's eldest daughter, is a principal beauty in a building.
name: Thomas Fuller

quote: Beauty is about perception, not about make-up. I think the beginning of all beauty is knowing and liking oneself. You can't put on make-up, or dress yourself, or do you hair with any sort of fun or joy if you're doing it from a position of correction.
name: Kevyn Aucoin

quote: That's why I began doing makeup in the first place: I was hoping that through helping people see the beauty in themselves, I could try and find it in me.
name: Kevyn Aucoin

quote: Beauty is only skin deep. I think what's really important is finding a balance of mind, body and spirit.
name: Jennifer Lopez

quote: When I tried to play something and screwed up, I'd hear some other note that would come into play. Then I started trying different things to find the beauty in it.
name: Dimebag Darrell

quote: The most common error made in matters of appearance is the belief that one should disdain the superficial and let the true beauty of one's soul shine through. If there are places on your body where this is a possibility, you are not attractive - you are leaking.
name: Charles Lamb

quote: The terrifying and edible beauty of Art Nouveau architecture.
name: Salvador Dali

quote: O, thou art fairer than the evening air clad in the beauty of a thousand stars.
name: Christopher Marlowe

quote: Through loyalty to the past, our mind refuses to realize that tomorrow's joy is possible only if today's makes way for it that each wave owes the beauty of its line only to the withdrawal of the preceding one.
name: Andre Gide

quote: There is no excellent beauty that hath not some strangeness in the proportion.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: Although beauty may be in the eye of the beholder, the feeling of being beautiful exists solely in the mind of the beheld.
name: Martha Beck

quote: Beauty, to me, is about being comfortable in your own skin. That, or a kick-ass red lipstick.
name: Gwyneth Paltrow

quote: The human mind is capable of excitement without the application of gross and violent stimulants and he must have a very faint perception of its beauty and dignity who does not know this.
name: William Wordsworth

quote: Beauty deprived of its proper foils and adjuncts ceases to be enjoyed as beauty, just as light deprived of all shadows ceases to be enjoyed as light.
name: John Ruskin

quote: The kind of beauty I want most is the hard-to-get kind that comes from within - strength, courage, dignity.
name: Ruby Dee

quote: Beauty for some provides escape, who gain a happiness in eyeing the gorgeous buttocks of the ape or Autumn sunsets exquisitely dying.
name: Langston Hughes

quote: To give pain is the tyranny to make happy, the true empire of beauty.
name: Samuel Butler

quote: The beauty of the world, which is so soon to perish, has two edges, one of laughter, one of anguish, cutting the heart asunder.
name: Virginia Woolf

quote: Every beauty which is seen here by persons of perception resembles more than anything else that celestial source from which we all are come.
name: Michelangelo

quote: Beauty always promises, but never gives anything.
name: Simone Weil

quote: To look almost pretty is an acquisition of higher delight to a girl who has been looking plain for the first fifteen years of her life than a beauty from her cradle can ever receive.
name: Jane Austen

quote: Poets say science takes away from the beauty of the stars - mere globs of gas atoms. I, too, can see the stars on a desert night, and feel them. But do I see less or more?
name: Richard P. Feynman

quote: We especially need imagination in science. It is not all mathematics, nor all logic, but it is somewhat beauty and poetry.
name: Maria Montessori

quote: The architect should strive continually to simplify the ensemble of the rooms should then be carefully considered that comfort and utility may go hand in hand with beauty.
name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: It is art that makes life, makes interest, makes importance... and I know of no substitute whatever for the force and beauty of its process.
name: Henry James

quote: It is dangerous for mortal beauty, or terrestrial virtue, to be examined by too strong a light. The torch of Truth shows much that we cannot, and all that we would not, see.
name: Samuel Johnson

quote: Poetry is something to make us wiser and better, by continually revealing those types of beauty and truth, which God has set in all men's souls.
name: James Russell Lowell

quote: I don't like people who have never fallen or stumbled. Their virtue is lifeless and it isn't of much value. Life hasn't revealed its beauty to them.
name: Boris Pasternak

quote: Taught from infancy that beauty is woman's sceptre, the mind shapes itself to the body, and roaming round its gilt cage, only seeks to adorn its prison.
name: Mary Wollstonecraft

quote: I tell myself that God gave my children many gifts - spirit, beauty, intelligence, the capacity to make friends and to inspire respect. There was only one gift he held back - length of life.

quote: Humanism was not wrong in thinking that truth, beauty, liberty, and equality are of infinite value, but in thinking that man can get them for himself without grace.
name: Simone Weil

quote: Don't get me wrong, I admire elegance and have an appreciation of the finer things in life. But to me, beauty lies in simplicity.
name: Mark Hyman

quote: Beauty is the disinterested one, without which the ancient world refused to understand itself, a word which both imperceptibly and yet unmistakably has bid farewell to our new world, a world of interests, leaving it to its own avarice and sadness.

quote: Courtesy is a silver lining around the dark clouds of civilization it is the best part of refinement and in many ways, an art of heroic beauty in the vast gallery of man's cruelty and baseness.
name: Bryant H. McGill

quote: An artist is an artist only because of his exquisite sense of beauty, a sense which shows him intoxicating pleasures, but which at the same time implies and contains an equally exquisite sense of all deformities and all disproportion.
name: Charles Baudelaire

quote: San Francisco is a mad city - inhabited for the most part by perfectly insane people whose women are of a remarkable beauty.
name: Rudyard Kipling

quote: Beauty is also submitted to the taste of time, so a beautiful woman from the Belle Epoch is not exactly the perfect beauty of today, so beauty is something that changes with time.
name: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: A whopping 89 percent of buyers start their home search online. How your house looks online is the modern equivalent of 'curb appeal.' Rent a wide-angle lens and good lighting, get rid of your clutter and post at least eight great photos to win the beauty contest.
name: Barbara Corcoran

quote: Sex and beauty are inseparable, like life and consciousness. And the intelligence which goes with sex and beauty, and arises out of sex and beauty, is intuition.
name: David Herbert Lawrence

quote: There's a beauty to wisdom and experience that cannot be faked. It's impossible to be mature without having lived.
name: Amy Grant

quote: Praise or blame has but a momentary effect on the man whose love of beauty in the abstract makes him a severe critic on his own works.
name: John Keats

quote: Youth is happy because it has the ability to see beauty. Anyone who keeps the ability to see beauty never grows old.
name: Franz Kafka

quote: It would be difficult for me not to conclude that the most perfect type of masculine beauty is Satan, as portrayed by Milton.
name: Charles Baudelaire

quote: I am little concerned with beauty or perfection. I don't care for the great centuries. All I care about is life, struggle, intensity.
name: Emile Zola

quote: Nonsense and beauty have close connections.

quote: Beauty ought to look a little surprised: it is the emotion that best suits her face. The beauty who does not look surprised, who accepts her position as her due - she reminds us too much of a prima donna.
name: E. M. Forster

quote: If we do not permit the earth to produce beauty and joy, it will in the end not produce food, either.
name: Joseph Wood Krutch

quote: I don't want to be perfect, but I do want to be a role model. My mom always tells me that imperfections equal beauty. All of us are imperfect.
name: Miley Cyrus

quote: To me, teamwork is the beauty of our sport, where you have five acting as one. You become selfless.
name: Mike Krzyzewski

quote: I decided that if I could paint that flower in a huge scale, you could not ignore its beauty.

quote: What the imagination seizes as beauty must be truth.

quote: With a great poet the sense of Beauty overcomes every other consideration, or rather obliterates all consideration.
name: John Keats

quote: In chess one cannot control everything. Sometimes a game takes an unexpected turn, in which beauty begins to emerge. Both players are always instrumental in this.
name: Vladimir Kramnik

quote: No spring nor summer beauty hath such grace as I have seen in one autumnal face.
name: John Donne

quote: I believe that children are our future. Teach them well and let them lead the way. Show them all the beauty they possess inside.

quote: The lover knows much more about absolute good and universal beauty than any logician or theologian, unless the latter, too, be lovers in disguise.
name: George Santayana

quote: It is well known that Beauty does not look with a good grace on the timid advances of Humour.
name: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: There is certainly no absolute standard of beauty. That precisely is what makes its pursuit so interesting.

quote: There is great beauty in going through life without anxiety or fear. Half our fears are baseless, and the other half discreditable.

quote: Grace in women has more effect than beauty.

quote: Old hands soil, it seems, whatever they caress, but they too have their beauty when they are joined in prayer. Young hands were made for caresses and the sheathing of love. It is a pity to make them join too soon.

quote: There is nothing that makes its way more directly into the soul than beauty.
name: Joseph Addison

quote: Competence, like truth, beauty, and contact lenses, is in the eye of the beholder.
name: Laurence J. Peter

quote: People say I'm extravagant because I want to be surrounded by beauty. But tell me, who wants to be surrounded by garbage?

quote: I always say you can never be extravagant with beauty. Beauty is God made real. Beauty is life.

quote: Grace is in garments, in movements, in manners beauty in the nude, and in forms. This is true of bodies but when we speak of feelings, beauty is in their spirituality, and grace in their moderation.

quote: I think everybody can agree that you can hear a certain song and it will put you in a certain mood, and that's just the beauty of music and I am so inspired by that.

quote: Paris is one of the most beautiful places in all the world. Unfortunately, I was so homesick I couldn't appreciate its beauty.

quote: The human soul needs actual beauty more than bread.
name: David Herbert Lawrence

quote: For the man sound of body and serene of mind there is no such thing as bad weather every day has its beauty, and storms which whip the blood do but make it pulse more vigorously.
name: George Gissing

quote: Who would not give up wit for power and beauty?

quote: Enhance and intensify one's vision of that synthesis of truth and beauty which is the highest and deepest reality.

quote: The beautiful seems right by force of beauty, and the feeble wrong because of weakness.
name: Virginia Woolf

quote: What is man's ultimate direction in life? It is to look for love, truth, virtue, and beauty.

quote: Beauty is desired in order that it may be befouled not for its own sake, but for the joy brought by the certainty of profaning it.

quote: A bad manner spoils everything, even reason and justice a good one supplies everything, gilds a No, sweetens a truth, and adds a touch of beauty to old age itself.

quote: Beauty is the lover's gift.

name: William Congreve

name: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quote: Our scientific age demands that we provide definitions, measurements, and statistics in order to be taken seriously. Yet most of the important things in life cannot be precisely defined or measured. Can we define or measure love, beauty, friendship, or decency, for example?

quote: Whether you come from heaven or hell, what does it matter, O Beauty!

quote: I love Rauschenberg. quote: In such ugly times, the only true protest is beauty.

quote: Beauty attracts us men but if, like an armed magnet it is pointed, beside, with gold and silver, it attracts with tenfold power.

quote: So much has been said and sung of beautiful young girls, why doesn't somebody wake up to the beauty of old women.

quote: In LA, where I live, it's all about perfectionism. Beauty is now defined by your bones sticking out of your decolletage. For that to be the standard is really perilous for women.

quote: Beauty is now defined by your bones sticking out of your decolletage. For that to be the standard is really perilous for women.
name: Alanis Morissette

quote: Beauty will be convulsive or will not be at all.
name: Andre Breton

name: Percy Bysshe Shelley

name: Jean Paul

quote: A bachelor never quite gets over the idea that he is a thing of beauty and a boy forever.
name: Helen Rowland

quote: Beauty and brains, pleasure and usability - they should go hand in hand.
name: Donald Norman

quote: Aging has a wonderful beauty and we should have respect for that.

name: Charles Baudelaire

quote: Beauty is the sole ambition, the exclusive goal of Taste.
name: Charles Baudelaire

quote: Swift speedy time, feathered with flying hours, Dissolves the beauty of the fairest brow.
name: Lord Chesterfield

quote: Beauty is that which is simultaneously attractive and sublime.
name: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

name: George Byron

name: Roy Ayers

name: Robert Motherwell

quote: I have always known what I wanted, and that was beauty... in every form.
name: Joan Crawford

name: Pope Paul VI

name: Nikos Kazantzakis

name: Janice Dickinson

name: Kevyn Aucoin

name: David Hume

name: Imelda Marcos

quote: Depression opens the door to beauty of some kind.

quote: Somehow a bachelor never quite gets over the idea that he is a thing of beauty and a boy forever.
name: Helen Rowland

quote: Beauty is not something you can count on. Usually, when people say you are beautiful, it is when there is a harmony between the inside and the outside.

name: Anne Lamott

quote: Only when inspired to go beyond consciousness by some extraordinary insight does beauty manifest unexpectedly.
name: Arthur Erickson

name: St. Jerome

quote: The 1990s, after the reign of terror of academic vandalism, will be a decade of restoration: restoration of meaning, value, beauty, pleasure, and emotion to art and restoration of art to its audience.
name: Camille Paglia

quote: I believe that history has shape, order, and meaning that exceptional men, as much as economic forces, produce change and that passe abstractions like beauty, nobility, and greatness have a shifting but continuing validity.
name: Camille Paglia

quote: Younger women have no problem in reconciling beauty with ambitions as a professional woman.
name: Camille Paglia

quote: It seems like the chaos of this world is accelerating, but so is the beauty in the consciousness of more and more people.

name: Ani DiFranco

name: Xenophon

name: Auguste Renoir

quote: I always find beauty in things that are odd and imperfect - they are much more interesting.
name: Marc Jacobs

name: Lascelles Abercrombie

quote: You fall into my arms. You are the good gift of destruction's path, When life sickens more than disease. And boldness is the root of beauty. Which draws us together.
name: Boris Pasternak

quote: Beyond the beauty, the sex, the titillation, the surface, there is a human being. And that has to emerge.
name: Jeanne Moreau

quote: Most women are dissatisfied with their appearance - it's the stuff that fuels the beauty and fashion industries.
name: Annie Lennox

name: Annie Lennox

name: Shirley MacLaine

quote: Beauty is grace and confidence. I've learned to accept and appreciate what nature gave me.
name: Lindsay Lohan

quote: I would rather be adorned by beauty of character than jewels. Jewels are the gift of fortune, while character comes from within.
name: Plautus

name: Sarah Bernhardt

name: Eliza Farnham

name: David Attenborough

quote: Beauty is only skin deep, but it's a valuable asset if you're poor or haven't any sense.
name: Vernon Howard

quote: There is little premium in poetry in a world that thinks of Pound and Whitman as a weight and a sampler, not an Ezra, a Walt, a thing of beauty, a joy forever.
name: Anna Quindlen

quote: Death is the mother of Beauty hence from her, alone, shall come fulfillment to our dreams and our desires.
name: Wallace Stevens

quote: The fame that goes with wealth and beauty is fleeting and fragile intellectual superiority is a possession glorious and eternal.
name: Sallust

quote: I didn't appreciate the young woman that I was, or my young beauty, because I was so obsessed with the fact that I felt fat. It's never good to add to anybody else's suffering. It's an important topic to really get the gravity and the importance of - dealing with dignity.

quote: It's such a diversion to be constantly thinking of better ways I can teach people math that my hunger is for that really, for new ways of translating the beauty of it.
name: Danica McKellar

quote: My beauty secret is absolutely no sun.

quote: Standards of beauty are arbitrary. Body shame exists only to the extent that our physiques don't match our own beliefs about how we should look.

quote: Because, if one is writing novels today, concentrating on the beauty of the prose is right up there with concentrating on your semi-colons, for wasted effort.
name: Neil Gaiman

quote: As soon as beauty is sought not from religion and love, but for pleasure, it degrades the seeker.
name: Annie Dillard

quote: Beauty is an outward gift which is seldom despised, except by those to whom it has been refused.
name: Edward Gibbon

quote: Beauty is often worse than wine intoxicating both the holder and beholder.
name: John Zimmerman

quote: All the freaky people make the beauty of the world.
name: Michael Franti

quote: I like to embrace natural beauty. I try to get at least 8 hours of sleep, drinking a lot of water and exercising.
name: Tia Mowry

quote: I find beauty in the grotesque, like most artists.
name: Alexander McQueen

quote: The past itself, as historical change continues to accelerate, has become the most surreal of subjects - making it possible... to see a new beauty in what is vanishing.
name: Susan Sontag

quote: It is shallow people who think beauty is frivolous or excessive. If you are bringing beauty and god, you are enriching the country. Rice feeds the body, books feed the mind, beauty feeds the soul. It is one thing I can really be proud of and stand tall in the world.
name: Imelda Marcos

quote: The only rich person is a person who is rich in spirit. I have no money deposit. I have only beauty deposit.
name: Imelda Marcos

quote: Jordan has a strange, haunting beauty and a sense of timelessness. Dotted with the ruins of empires once great, it is the last resort of yesterday in the world of tomorrow. I love every inch of it.

quote: I am a great lover of art, in many forms: paintings, objets, textiles. I don't have the talent for painting, but I have a very good sense of colour, a love of visual beauty.
name: Jacqueline Bisset

quote: Beauty is nature's brag, and must be shown in courts, at feasts, and high solemnities, where most may wonder at the workmanship.
name: John Milton

quote: I pretty much borrow my entire beauty regime from my mom.
name: Rashida Jones

quote: Ads featuring real women and real beauty are such a necessary component to offset the potentially dangerous programming out there for little girls.
name: Rashida Jones

name: Sydney J. Harris

quote: Strength of character may be learned at work, but beauty of character is learned at home.
name: Henry Drummond

quote: I am still a victim of chess. It has all the beauty of art - and much more. It cannot be commercialized. Chess is much purer than art in its social position.
name: Marcel Duchamp

quote: I do not know which to prefer, The beauty of inflections, Or the beauty of innuendoes, The blackbird whistling, Or just after.
name: Wallace Stevens

quote: Beauty and the devil are the same thing.
name: Robert Mapplethorpe

quote: You can take no credit for beauty at sixteen. But if you are beautiful at sixty, it will be your soul's own doing.
name: Marie Stopes

quote: Often, the roles I'm offered in England are melancholic women who are filled with regret for the past, regret for their fading beauty.
name: Kristin Scott Thomas

quote: I am not fighting for success, just to get more beauty out of myself and share it with more people.
name: Ben Okri

quote: Lila can't be a model until she's at least 21. She is already a mini-me - it is scary. She already has her own beauty kit.
name: Kate Moss

quote: I would warn you that I do not attribute to nature either beauty or deformity, order or confusion. Only in relation to our imagination can things be called beautiful or ugly, well-ordered or confused.

quote: I'm really proud of myself because I've pared my beauty regimen down to a cream blush and berry-tinted lip balm, which has saved me so much time.
name: Katherine Heigl

quote: Wealth, beauty, and fame are transient. When those are gone, little is left except the need to be useful.
name: Gene Tierney

quote: Italian men do appreciate beautiful women. They're not afraid of the beauty, which is nice.
name: Eva Herzigova

quote: I want, of course, peace, grace, and beauty. How do you do that? You work for it.
name: Studs Terkel

quote: Bracketing has turned all my experiences, remembered and present, into a gallery of miracles where I wander around dazzled by the beauty of events I cannot explain.
name: Martha Beck

quote: Design is not making beauty, beauty emerges from selection, affinities, integration, love.
name: Louis Kahn

quote: Beauty is a relation, and the apprehension of it a comparison.
name: Gerard Manley Hopkins

quote: We come in many different shapes and sizes, and we need to support each other and our differences. Our beauty is in our differences.
name: Carre Otis

quote: Her beauty didn't do her any good and she couldn't use it in any positive way or manipulative way. I just hope that people will look and see and believe in that hope of love, that hope of freedom, even if it was just for a limited time.

quote: Well, I've never looked upon myself as being a beauty, per se.

quote: After a decade this glum, we deserved a shot of 'Glee,' a show that restored our faith in the power of song, the beauty of dance, and the magic of 'spirit fingers' to chase our cares and woes into somebody else's backyard.
name: James Wolcott

quote: For the mind disturbed, the still beauty of dawn is nature's finest balm.

quote: Part of the beauty of Judaism, and surely this is so for other faiths also, is that it gently restores control over time. Three times a day we stop what we are doing and turn to God in prayer. We recover perspective. We inhale a deep breath of eternity.
name: Jonathan Sacks

quote: I've actually spent a lot of time researching beauty products, how they are produced and how they are sold.

quote: For I must tell you that we artists cannot tread the path of Beauty without Eros keeping company with us and appointing himself as our guide.

name: Thomas Mann

quote: What is sacred among one people may be ridiculous in another and what is despised or rejected by one cultural group, may in a different environment become the cornerstone for a great edifice of strange grandeur and beauty.

quote: Art is beauty, the perpetual invention of detail, the choice of words, the exquisite care of execution.
name: Theophile Gautier

quote: I'm not one of those women who thinks beauty is a curse.

quote: I like the idea of accessibility, coming from a lower-middle-class background myself, I feel like beauty and products should be accessible to all women over the world.

name: Julie Burchill

quote: Physical beauty is such a strange thing.

quote: I tried for a while to be an agricultural worker and was hopelessly bored. I would stand around in heaps of manure and sing about the beauty of the work I wasn't doing.
name: Theodore Bikel

quote: Art requires philosophy, just as philosophy requires art. Otherwise, what would become of beauty?

quote: Beauty can come in strange forms.

name: Joan Collins

quote: Bologna is the best city in Italy for food and has the least number of tourists. With its medieval beauty, it has it all.

quote: I think we should all be tolerant of each other and embrace each others' strengths and differences and uniqueness and beauty.

quote: There's a beauty in being part of a band, when there's equality and trust.

quote: Los Angeles is like a beauty parlor at the end of the universe.

quote: The ideal has many names, and beauty is but one of them.

quote: I'm proud that today, at 43 years old, I've come to value the aging process and focus on inner rather than outer beauty.

quote: Every performance is different. That's the beauty of it.

quote: That's the beauty of being a comedian - it's the one job you're allowed to do that. We're lucky. We're really lucky.

quote: The difference between Marilyn Monroe and the early Pamela Anderson is not that great. What's amazing is that the taste of American men and international tastes in terms of beauty have essentially stayed the same. Styles change, but our view of beauty stays the same.

quote: The beauty of having a producer is that you have someone who says, You're finished.

name: Gail Simmons

quote: Beauty set up distance between other people and me. It warped their behavior.

quote: People see you as an object, not as a person, and they project a set of expectations onto you. People who don't have it think beauty is a blessing, but actually it sets you apart.

quote: A child does not notice the greatness and the beauty of nature and the splendor of God in his works.

quote: Once you go inside and weed through the muck, you will find the real beauty, the truth about yourself.

quote: I used to wear a lot of red lipstick, and when I got a pimple, I'd cover it up with eyeliner to turn it into a beauty mark.

quote: I'm flatchested, I'm short, I'm brunette, I have droopy eyes, and so people have a hard time casting me as a 'beauty.'

quote: Doors open because you're beautiful, but I wouldn't cultivate beauty to the exclusion of brains.

quote: Beauty lasts five minutes. Maybe longer if you have a good plastic surgeon.

quote: Asian people have a unique way about them and a different sense of beauty. It's exotic to me. I like they way Asians project their feelings. There's a hardness to the culture, but at the same time there's a delicateness.

name: Walter Pater

quote: What is important, then, is not that the critic should possess a correct abstract definition of beauty for the intellect, but a certain kind of temperament, the power of being deeply moved by the presence of beautiful objects.
name: Walter Pater

quote: One of the most beautiful passages of Rousseau is that in the sixth book of Confessions, where he describes the awakening in him of the literary sense. Of such wisdom, the poetic passion, the desire of beauty, the love of art for its own sake, has most.

quote: I mean the beauty of being a writer is it's not like being a swimmer. When they were talking about our Olympic swimmers and they'd say, 'Oh she's so old,' and she's all of 25 or something. quote: Truth is a thing immortal and perpetual, and it gives to us a beauty that fades not away in time.

quote: No single man can be taken as a model for a perfect figure, for no man lives on earth who is endowed with the whole of beauty.

quote: Music, art, theater. I'm just a big fan of beauty.

quote: The more people explore the world, the more they realize in every country there's a different aesthetic. Beauty really is in the eye of the beholder.

quote: Form follows beauty.

name: Robert Bridges

quote: I read 'The Great Gatsby' in high school and was hypnotized by the beauty of the sentences and moved by the story about the irrevocability of lost love.

name: Mstislav Rostropovich

quote: Well I do find the beauty in animals. I find beauty everywhere. I find beauty in my garden.

quote: I don't have any beauty shop memories. I remember the barber shop.

name: Peter Nivio Zarlenga

quote: I like to have Chinese furniture in my home as a constant and painful reminder of how much has been destroyed in China. The contrast between the beauty of the past and the ugliness of the modern is nowhere sharper than in China.
name: Jung Chang

quote: When you are at the bottom, you find beauty in such little things, and goodness in such little gestures. When I compare any struggle today to ones that I may have had in my childhood, there is nothing that can bring me down.
name: Natalia Vodianova

quote: This is why cup finals are so special because on the day anyone can beat anyone. That's what it's all about and that's why for me the FA Cup and the Carling Cup are the best cups in the world. That's the beauty of the cup.
name: Ian Rush

quote: I've been on the cover of 'Time' magazine three times, not for my beauty but because what I was doing was newsworthy around the world. I've worked with teams all my life, but I've been nice and I've been kind.
name: Cheryl Tiegs

quote: I look OK. I look better in person than I do on film, which is bad because it's how I make my living, but I am not a beauty and on balance I am glad.
name: Felicity Huffman

quote: Beauty can make you powerful in a way that isn't good for you. Being OK is better for the person I have become.
name: Felicity Huffman

quote: I'm from Canada, and New Zealand feels like you took all the best bits of Canada and squished them onto a tiny island like Hawaii. I was absolutely blown away by the beauty of the South Island.
name: Evangeline Lilly

quote: Shortly thereafter, some friends encouraged me to try out for the Miss South Carolina World beauty pageant. To my surprise, I won - and was sent to New York City to compete nationally.
name: Donna Rice

quote: This is so cliche, but my beauty icon would have to be Angelina Jolie. She looks like she wears natural makeup, but she's still beautiful.
name: Tila Tequila

quote: I think every person has their own identity and beauty. Everyone being different is what is really beautiful. If we were all the same, it would be boring.
name: Tila Tequila

quote: My sisters and I were fortunate to travel through Asia and Europe at very young ages. We confronted extraordinary beauty in Athens and unspeakable poverty in India.
name: Mary Chapin Carpenter

quote: Pastry is different from cooking because you have to consider the chemistry, beauty and flavor. It's not just sugar and eggs thrown together. I tell my pastry chefs to be in tune for all of this. You have to be challenged by using secret or unusual ingredients.
name: Ron Ben-Israel

quote: Beauty is not everything!
name: Chita Rivera

quote: The beauty comes with the balance. Everyone should find his own balance in his personal as well as his professional life. Once you do so, you will feel and look beautiful.
name: Karolina Kurkova

quote: In things to be seen at once, much variety makes confusion, another vice of beauty. In things that are not seen at once, and have no respect one to another, great variety is commendable, provided this variety transgress not the rules of optics and geometry.
name: Christopher Wren

quote: You don't have to save the world, but you can be in the world-that's where the beauty comes from.
name: Daphne Zuniga

quote: Seek goodness and be goodness. Seek beauty and be beauty. Seek love and be love.
name: Bryant McGill

quote: I know as an actor there is a certain liberation auditioning for a role that has no beauty requirements.
name: Mireille Enos

quote: You can muck around with different guitars for certain bits, but you have to have your own sound. That's your benchmark, that's your sound. I also play a Black Beauty. It sounds amazing.
name: Dan Hawkins

quote: I have to hit the gym. I have beauty appointments. I have to work toward my next job and maintaining my image, just like an athlete.
name: Linda Evangelista

quote: The beauty of 'The Walking Dead' and the beauty of being on a television show for a while, is that, it's your backstory, it's part of what you are, it's what you carry with you every day.
name: Laurie Holden

quote: We need a balanced, long term energy policy to reduce our dependence on foreign oil and preserve the beauty of the land we love.
name: Heather Wilson

quote: Find beauty not only in the thing itself but in the pattern of the shadows, the light and dark which that thing provides.
name: Junichiro Tanizaki

quote: When the soul looks out of its body, it should see only beauty in its path. These are the sights we must hold in mind, in order to move to a higher place.
name: Yusef Lateef

quote: The sport of horse racing which, at its best, showcases the majestic beauty of this animal and the athleticism of jockeys, has reached an alarming level of corruption and exploitation.
name: Tom Udall

quote: We were astonished by the beauty and refinement of the art displayed by the objects surpassing all we could have imagined - the impression was overwhelming.
name: Howard Carter

quote: The beauty of jazz is that it's malleable. People are addressing it to suit their own personalities.
name: Pat Metheny

quote: Beauty is but a flower, which wrinkles will devour.
name: Thomas Nash

quote: I live by the philosophy that beauty starts from within, and I make a conscious effort to fill my body with nutrients through the food I eat.
name: Miranda Kerr

quote: Everyone has a different beauty and different qualities and I think that women need to learn to love their qualities and be comfortable in the fact that everyone is different.
name: Miranda Kerr

quote: The beauty of a face is not a separate quality but a relation or proportion of qualities to each other.
name: George H. Mead

quote: Truth isn't always beauty, but the hunger for it is.
name: Nadine Gordimer

quote: I don't believe in one ideal beauty.
name: Zac Posen

quote: I have a talent for happiness. I look with the eyes of a painter, and I see beauty.
name: Sylvia Kristel

quote: I just want to continue to break barriers and to show the industry and the world that beauty is diverse, and you don't have to be a certain stereotype to be beautiful.
name: Joan Smalls

quote: I believe that true beauty of chess is more than enough to satisfy all possible demands.
name: Alexander Alekhine

quote: Oh! this opponent, this collaborator against your will, whose notion of beauty always differs from yours and whose means are often too limited for active assistance to your intentions!
name: Alexander Alekhine

quote: The beauty of it is when you can just show up and hit the notes.
name: John Lone

quote: I just try to play music from my heart and bring as much beauty as I can to as many people as I can. Just give them other alternatives, especially people who aren't exposed to creative music.
name: Charlie Haden

quote: We're here to bring beauty to the world and make a difference in this planet. That's what art forms are about.
name: Charlie Haden

quote: I'd like to make really important movies, like American Beauty. I was really proud to be a part of that movie.
name: Allison Janney

quote: Even in decline, a virtuous man increases the beauty of his behavior. A burning stick, though turned to the ground, has its flame drawn upwards.
name: Saskya Pandita

quote: Knowing who the actors were as you were designing them helped, with Catherine's beauty and Renee's frailty, they directed me visually just by who they were.
name: Colleen Atwood

quote: The arts, quite simply, nourish the soul. They sustain, comfort, inspire. There is nothing like that exquisite moment when you first discover the beauty of connecting with others in celebration of larger ideals and shared wisdom.
name: Gordon Gee

quote: I think Islam has been hijacked by the idea that all Muslims are terrorists that Islam is about hate, about war, about jihad - I think that hijacks the spirituality and beauty that exists within Islam. I believe in allowing Islam to be seen in context and in its entirety and being judged on what it really is, not what you think it is.
name: Aasif Mandvi

quote: There's one more thing I want to say. It's a touchy subject. Black beauty. Black sensuality. We live in a culture where the beauty of black people isn't always as celebrated as other types. I'd like to help change that if I can!
name: Jody Watley

quote: Truth is, I cut my hair for freedom, not for beauty.
name: Chrisette Michele

quote: When I was young my Father used to tell me that the two most worthwhile pursuits in life were the pursuit of truth and of beauty and I believe that Alfred Nobel must have felt much the same when he gave these prizes for literature and the sciences.
name: Frederick Sanger

quote: Surely these women won't lose any more of their beauty and charm by putting a ballot in a ballot box once a year than they are likely to lose standing in foundries or laundries all year round. There is no harder contest than the contest for bread, let me tell you that.
name: Rose Schneiderman

quote: My main aim has always been to do good quality films with roles that have some substance. With Power and Beauty there were loads of things that I liked about the movie, which made me opt for it.
name: Natasha Henstridge

quote: Fashion is quite inclusive and good at embracing different things and different forms of beauty. It's a very liberal industry. You can be yourself. Just not overweight.
name: Andrej Pejic

quote: My mum is my beauty icon, because she represents what I think beauty is.
name: Bar Refaeli

quote: My everyday job is about superficial beauty, but when I'm not working I prefer to work on my inner beauty - I read a lot, I try to learn.
name: Bar Refaeli

quote: Beauty, of course, is the most important requirement and the paramount asset of the applicant.
name: Florenz Ziegfeld

quote: In all my career, in my ups and downs, I've never had a beauty campaign. This was meaningful that at almost 41 years old, I could be getting my first beauty campaign. It made me feel really great.
name: Teri Hatcher

quote: I'm 40 and I just got my first beauty campaign with Clairol Nice and Easy.
name: Teri Hatcher

quote: This was meaningful that at almost 41 years old, I could be getting my first beauty campaign.
name: Teri Hatcher

quote: Beauty, like truth, is relative to the time when one lives and to the individual who can grasp it. The expression of beauty is in direct ratio to the power of conception the artist has acquired.
name: Gustave Courbet

quote: Visual surprise is natural in the Caribbean it comes with the landscape, and faced with its beauty, the sigh of History dissolves.
name: Derek Walcott

quote: I know no subject more elevating, more amazing, more ready to the poetical enthusiasm, the philosophical reflection, and the moral sentiment than the works of nature. Where can we meet such variety, such beauty, such magnificence?
name: James Thomson

quote: For, when with beauty we can virtue join, We paint the semblance of a form divine.
name: Matthew Prior

quote: I've just finished reading a book about the brilliant Margaret Rutherford. She wasn't a beauty, but inside she was absolutely blazing and passionate about her work. She's one of those life-affirming characters.
name: Sophie Thompson

quote: My definition of love is being full. Complete. It makes everything lighter. Beauty is something you see. Love is something you feel.
name: Sharon Tate

quote: Through my optimism I naturally prefer and capture the beauty in life.
name: Leni Riefenstahl

quote: I like to find the beauty in the ugly. When I'm in a thrift store, I gravitate toward pieces I know I'll wear a ton, and insane pieces that I'm sure most people would consider gross. But I find them inspiring. Our van is currently stocked with some of my random findings from this tour. Maybe I'll call my aesthetic 'van fashion.'
name: Victoria Legrand

quote: Beauty is everything.
name: Jorja Fox

quote: Instead, it appears to be a particular mark of beauty that it is considered with tranquil satisfaction that it pleases if we also do not possess it and we are still far removed from demanding to possess it.
name: Moses Mendelssohn

quote: I was always anti-marriage. I didn't understand monogamy. I couldn't figure out how that could last. And then I met Bryn and I started to understand the beauty of constancy and history and change and going on the roller coaster with someone - of having a partner in life.
name: Maria Bello

quote: Life deprived of beauty is not worthy of being called human.
name: Luis Barragan

quote: Rich men's houses are seldom beautiful, rarely comfortable, and never original. It is a constant source of surprise to people of moderate means to observe how little a big fortune contributes to Beauty.
name: Margot Asquith

quote: The best beauty advice I ever received is to keep skin hydrated and limit harsh exposure to the sun. If you are set on the tanned look, there are plenty of great creams that will give you a healthy-looking glow.
name: Erica Durance

quote: I maintain my inner beauty by trying to lead a balanced life in general. I try to eat healthy foods, but... that doesn't mean I won't treat myself now and then! I work out almost every day, which gives me more energy and helps me feel stronger. I also try to be a genuinely good person to the people around me.
name: Erica Durance

quote: Acting is still, of course, what I love to do most. The beauty of it is that by changing characters, it never gets boring.
name: Christopher Lambert

quote: I always say beauty is only sin deep.
name: Hector Hugh Munro

quote: All I wanted was to connect my moods with those of Paris. Beauty paints and when it painted most, I shot.
name: Ernst Haas

quote: Coming in solemn beauty like slow old tunes of Spain.
name: John Masefield

quote: Where is there beauty when you see deprivation and starvation?
name: Rosalind Russell

quote: Beauty doesn't matter because in the end, we all lose our looks and all we have is our heart.
name: Ann Curry

quote: We have to get back to the beauty of just being alive in this present moment.
name: Mary McDonnell

quote: In prison, inmates sometimes use Cheetos and grape juice as makeup. I wouldn't use that beauty regimen around Britney Spears - she might lick your face off!
name: Joel McHale

quote: I feel fortunate that I'm not a beauty. I'm not a classic beauty. I feel it is harder for girls who are like that. There are fewer parts.
name: Olivia Colman

quote: But my most favourite pursuit, after my daily exertions at the Foundry, was Astronomy. There were frequently clear nights when the glorious objects in the Heavens were seen in most attractive beauty and brilliancy.
name: James Nasmyth

quote: To copy beauty forfeits all pretense to fame to copy faults is want of sense.
name: Charles Churchill

quote: Beauty, sweet love, is like the morning dew, Whose short refresh upon tender green, Cheers for a time, but till the sun doth show And straight is gone, as it had never been.
name: Samuel Daniel

quote: What I loved about 'Summer' was that they were these four bright kids with a wonderful future. In a way, she was the one with the brains, and then you have the beauty queen and the jock and the introvert.
name: Kevin Williamson

quote: Stories aren't the beauty of what did happen. They're the beauty of what could happen.
name: Brad Meltzer

quote: I will admit to hoarding beauty products. I'm a beauty lady.
name: Naya Rivera

quote: Beauty, unlike the rest of the gifts handed out at birth, does not require dedication, patience and hard work to pay off. But it's also the only gift that does not keep on giving.
name: Paulina Porizkova

quote: Beauty magazines make my girlfriend feel ugly.
name: James De La Vega

quote: Coercion may prevent many transgressions but it robs even actions which are legal of a part of their beauty. Freedom may lead to many transgressions, but it lends even to vices a less ignoble form.
name: Wilhelm von Humboldt

quote: People come to see beauty, and I dance to give it to them.
name: Judith Jamison

quote: And beauty immortal awakes from the tomb.
name: James Beattie

quote: I do believe very much in the idea of unexpected or 'convulsive' beauty - beauty in the service of liberty.
name: Jeff Vandermeer

quote: The double hundred Fowler hit in the Madras Test was an absolute beauty.
name: David Gower

quote: Everyone can identify with a fragrant garden, with beauty of sunset, with the quiet of nature, with a warm and cozy cottage.
name: Thomas Kincade

quote: People who put my paintings on their walls are putting their values on their walls: faith, family, home, a simpler way of living, the beauty of nature, quiet, tranquillity, peace, joy, hope. They beckon you into this world that provides an alternative to your nightly news broadcast.
name: Thomas Kincade

quote: Hold fast to youth and beauty.
name: Elizabeth Arden

quote: Tramping is too easy with all this money. My days were more exciting when I was penniless and had to forage around for my next meal... I've decided that I'm going to live this life for some time to come. The freedom and simple beauty of it is just too good to pass up.
name: Christopher McCandless

quote: It never seems to occur to some people, that, like beauty, a sense of humor may sometimes be fatal.
name: Edgar Rice Burroghs

quote: The closest thing I use to beauty products is the grease on the pizza from John's Pizzeria.
name: Mark Feuerstein

quote: I'm very proud of my love for Whitney Houston. She really changed my life. She made my life a better life. She was so beautiful in her love for God, her love for her family and her love for music. She truly loved her music. She could do everything! She had flawless rhythm, flawless pitch, flawless feeling, and flawless beauty.
name: Narada Michael Walden

quote: I first fell in love with music when I was a little boy. When I first heard music, I felt the beauty in it. Then, being able to tap along on a table top and box was great, but my favorite thing to do was to watch records spin. I would almost get hypnotized by it. These things are what drew me in initially.
name: Narada Michael Walden

quote: I'm not a party animal I took my job as Miss USA very seriously... Sometimes, of course, I want to let it all go. Even though I'm a beauty queen, you're also an unofficial ambassador, and there's a lot of pressure.
name: Rima Fakih

quote: The beauty of dystopia is that it lets us vicariously experience future worlds - but we still have the power to change our own.
name: Ally Condie

quote: I have a fantastic wife, and not only in terms of external beauty. Her priority and mine is our children. That is our choice.
name: Luis Figo

quote: I played with the same band for years and years and there's a beauty to having one solid core that you keep exploring. On the other hand, it's nice to throw yourself in different situations where you find out things about your own resources.
name: Grant-Lee Phillips

quote: The ever increasing spiritual damage caused by life within the big city will make this hunger practically uncontrollable when we build here on this the landscape of our homeland we must be clear that we will protect its beauty.
name: Fritz Todt

quote: In places where this beauty has already disappeared, we will reconstruct it.
name: Fritz Todt

quote: The awesomeness of God is that even in the works of the Beach Boys, Beatles, etc., the beauty of the music is a mere reflection of what God does everyday. He creates music of all kinds and moods.
name: John Foster

quote: It is conventional to call 'monster' any blending of dissonant elements. I call 'monster' every original inexhaustible beauty.
name: Alfred Jarry

quote: As long as I love Beauty I am young.
name: W. H. Davies

quote: When I first thought of the idea for 'Sweet Valley High,' I loved the idea of high school as microcosm of the real world. And what I really liked was how it moved things on from 'Sleeping Beauty'-esque romance novels where the girl had to wait for the hero. This would be girl-driven, very different, I decided - and indeed it is.
name: Francine Pascal

quote: Though there might not be any easy answers to the problem of poverty, its most compelling scribes do not resign themselves to representation solely for the sake of those age-old verities of truth and beauty.
name: Leslie Jamison

quote: Far from creating a new formalism, what these can yield is something far transcending surface values since they not only embody form as beauty, but also form in which intuitions or ideas or conjectures have taken visible substance.
name: Max Bill

quote: Beauty: the adjustment of all parts proportionately so that one cannot add or subtract or change without impairing the harmony of the whole.
name: Leon Battista Alberti

quote: Time takes the ugliness and horror out of death and turns it into beauty.
name: Dodie Smith

quote: I'm not out here to win a beauty contest.
name: Kirk Gibson

quote: I think Whitman more than any other poet possessed the gift of revealing to others the beauty of everything around us, the beauty of nature, the beauty of human beings.
name: Ella R. Bloor

quote: I'm not trying to stump anybody... it's the beauty of the language that I'm interested in.
name: Buddy Holly

quote: Suddenly life has new meaning to me, there's beauty up above and things we never take notice of, you wake up suddenly you're in love.
name: Billy Ocean

quote: Beauty is altogether in the eye of the beholder.
name: Lew Wallace

quote: Perfect health, like perfect beauty, is a rare thing and so, it seems, is perfect disease.
name: Peter Latham

quote: The beauty of having short hair is that I actually can wash and style it at home!
name: Meagan Good

quote: The cottage garden most for use designed, Yet not of beauty destitute.
name: Charlotte Smith

quote: You will also allow me to thank the Academy for inviting me to lecture in Stockholm, for its hospitality, and for the opportunity afforded me for admiring the charm of your people and the beauty of your country.
name: Guglielmo Marconi

quote: It's harder, but we're still finding oil in Oklahoma today. The bar has been raised on startup companies, but it can still be done. Every regulation and every rule limits you, but, yes, it can still be done. That's the beauty of living in a free country and having the freedom to have an idea and become an entrepreneur.
name: Harold Hamm

quote: Great designers seldom make great advertising men, because they get overcome by the beauty of the picture - and forget that merchandise must be sold.
name: James Randolph Adams

quote: The beauty of the past belongs to the past.
name: Margaret Bourke-White

quote: It is important to fund young researchers who want to do curiosity-driven research. Curiosity-driven research is a part of life. Some people are curious. They want to learn more about nature and society should help that. It's like art: you can learn more and bring more beauty.
name: Serge Haroche

quote: I have no right to beauty. I had been condemned to masculine ugliness.
name: Renee Vivien

quote: Search for beauty without features, something deeper than any signs.
name: Francesca da Rimini

quote: I have several computer companies. One of them I have a program for wide-format printing. I have a beauty program. So I have several different programs that I own for printing.
name: Jerry Mathers

quote: There are elements of intrinsic beauty in the simplification of a house built on the log cabin idea.
name: Gustav Stickley

quote: First, there is the bare beauty of the logs themselves with their long lines and firm curves. Then there is the open charm felt of the structural features which are not hidden under plaster and ornament, but are clearly revealed, a charm felt in Japanese architecture.
name: Gustav Stickley

quote: There is an abiding beauty which may be appreciated by those who will see things as they are and who will ask for no reward except to see.
name: Vera Brittain

quote: I think love and beauty are what life is all about.
name: John Derek

quote: Beauty is the first test: there is no permanent place in the world for ugly mathematics.
name: Godfrey Harold Hardy

quote: For the greater beauty of the instrument, the balls representing the planets are to be of considerable bigness but so contrived, that they may be taken off at pleasure, and others, much smaller, and fitter for some purposes, put in their places.
name: David Rittenhouse

quote: Literature boils with the madcap careers of writers brought to the edge by the demands of living on their nerves, wringing out their memories and their nightmares to extract meaning, truth, beauty.
name: Herbert Gold

quote: I have a book out called 'The Beauty Equation' and it discusses how off track we have gone in considering beauty.
name: Nigel Barker

quote: Jazz is a very democratic musical form. It comes out of a communal experience. We take our respective instruments and collectively create a thing of beauty.
name: Max Roach

quote: But I fear, my lot being cast in Scotland, that beauty would not be content.
name: Anne Boyd

quote: For most people, we often marvel at the beauty of a sunrise or the magnificence of a full moon, but it is impossible to fathom the magnitude of the universe that surrounds us.
name: Richard H. Baker

quote: Hath the spirit of all beauty Kissed you in the path of duty?
name: Anna Katharine Green

quote: There are two kinds of artists in this world those that work because the spirit is in them, and they cannot be silent if they would, and those that speak from a conscientious desire to make apparent to others the beauty that has awakened their own admiration.
name: Anna Katharine Green

quote: We Orientals find beauty not only in the thing itself but in the pattern of the shadows, the light and darkness which that thing provides.
name: Junichiro Tanizaki

quote: Mathematics are the result of mysterious powers which no one understands, and which the unconscious recognition of beauty must play an important part. Out of an infinity of designs a mathematician chooses one pattern for beauty's sake and pulls it down to earth.
name: Marston Morse

quote: A small house must depend on its grouping with other houses for its beauty, and for the preservation of light air and the maximum of surrounding open space.
name: Clarence Stein

quote: Personality is more important than beauty, but imagination is more important than both of them.
name: Laurette Taylor

quote: You can take no credit for beauty at sixteen. But if you are beautiful at sixty, it will be your own soul's doing.
name: Marie Carmichael Stopes

quote: And queenly is the state she keeps, In beauty's lofty trust secure.
name: William Allen Butler

quote: If beauty isn't genius it usually signals at least a high level of animal cunning.
name: Peter York

quote: I don't know what the secret to longevity as an actress is. It's more than talent and beauty. Maybe it's the audience seeing itself in you.
name: Joan Blondell

quote: The beauty of women was the first expression of my photography.
name: Alberto Korda

quote: What I want to give in the theatre is beauty, that's what I want to give.
name: Dame Edith Evans

quote: I want the Arabic Granada, that which is art, which is all that seems to me beauty and emotion.
name: Isaac Albeniz

quote: The flowers anew, returning seasons bring but beauty faded has no second spring.
name: Ambrose Philips

quote: Those who find beauty in all of nature will find themselves at one with the secrets of life itself.
name: L. Wolfe Gilbert

quote: All the beauty of the world, 'tis but skin deep.
name: Ralph Venning

quote: Beauty is the still birth of suffering, every woman knows that.
name: Emily Prager

quote: I feel by posing for Playboy I've discovered my own sexuality and beauty, and I feel more confident than ever.
name: Heather Kozar
